title: Magnetic field - magnetic field line diagram

content.question: Side views of two arrangements of bar magnets with corresponding magnetic field lines are shown in the figures. Which arrangement has the stronger magnetic field at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>?

choices.label: Both are the same and nonzero

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
